question: What is the name of the veteran economist and former member of the Planning Commission, who recently passed away?
explanation:
Veteran economist and former member of the Planning Commission, A.Vaidyanathan recently passed away.
He served as a Chairperson of the Government of India Task Force on Revival of Cooperative Credit Institutions in 2004. He joined the National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER) in 1956. He also served in the Food and Agricultural Organisation, Rome. He played a crucial role in developing Indiaâ€™s statistical system and the National Sample Survey.
